definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
see 冬蟲夏草|冬虫夏草[dong1 chong2 xia4 cao3]

sentences.english: All summer, my goal HAS BEEN to catch a firefly. ---How do you translate HAS BEEN?
sentences.chinese: 整个夏天，我的目的就是捉到一只荧火虫。

sentences.english: The feedback will become so strong it destroys the wormhole.
sentences.chinese: 反馈变得很强大而毁坏了虫洞。

sentences.english: Networks using wormhole routing techniques are particularly vulnerable to deadlock.
sentences.chinese: 采用虫孔路由技术，网络中容易发生死锁。

sentences.english: Voldemort throws Wormtail out of a window.
sentences.chinese: 老伏把虫尾巴丢出窗户。

sentences.english: Two races of European corn borers sharing the same field may also be splitting up.
sentences.chinese: 两种在同一田地里的欧洲玉米螟虫也产生了分裂。

sentences.english: Looks a bit like a worm so we call them space-time worms.
sentences.chinese: 看起来有点像虫子，所以我们称为时空虫。

sentences.english: Babesiosis can cause hemolytic anemia in dogs.
sentences.chinese: 巴贝斯虫病能引起犬只的溶血性贫血。

sentences.english: He tried to devise a foolproof plan for getting rid of termites.
sentences.chinese: 没有一种绝对可靠的方法消灭夏天的蝇虫。

sentences.english: In contrast, during the Famennian the radiolarian fauna was well developed and diversified.
sentences.chinese: 相反，放射虫动物群在法门期得到了重大发展。

sentences.english: Eg. The red spot on his arm is a sting.
sentences.chinese: 他胳膊上的小红点是虫叮的伤痕。

sentences.english: You can apply canned shellac with a disposible paint brush.
sentences.chinese: 你能用油漆刷子应用罐装虫漆。

sentences.english: This is the first report of Triassic Radiolaria within the Yarlung-Zangbo Suture Zone.
sentences.chinese: 这是雅鲁藏布江缝合带三叠纪放射虫的首次报告。

sentences.english: Sunlit waterfall spray tumbles into our boat and a chorus of various insects rings in our ears.
sentences.chinese: 阳光下的瀑布水花洒落进小船，虫鸣声不绝于耳。

sentences.english: Spirited debates have erupted between physicists concerning these wormholes.
sentences.chinese: 之间爆发了热烈的争论，就这些虫洞物理学家。

sentences.english: An investigation on the scale insects on ornamental plants was conducted in Huaibei city, Anhui province.
sentences.chinese: 对淮北市园林植物蚧虫种类进行了调查研究。

sentences.english: Contains calcium for corals and carbon dioxide for zooxanthellae.
sentences.chinese: 含珊瑚所需钙及虫黄藻所需二氧化碳。

definition: to live in or on another organism as a parasite/to live by taking advantage of others/parasitism/parasitic
